thread.title: Trump tweets 'Iran is playing with fire,' says won't be as kind as Obama - Middle East - Jerusalem Post
thread.title_full: Trump tweets 'Iran is playing with fire,' says won't be as kind as Obama - Middle East - Jerusalem Post

title: Trump tweets 'Iran is playing with fire,' says won't be as kind as Obama - Middle East - Jerusalem Post
text:
Trump tweets 'Iran is playing with fire,' says won't be as kind as Obama By REUTERS 03 February 2017 13:58 Iran's decision to test-fire a ballistic missile on Sunday helped trigger Trump's decision, which could be announced as early as Friday. Trump and Rouhani. (photo credit:REUTERS) 
WASHINGTON - US President Donald Trump tweeted early on Friday that "Iran is playing with fire" and "they don't appreciate how kind President Obama was to them. Not me!" Iran is playing with fire - they don't appreciate how "kind" President Obama was to them. Not me! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 3, 2017 Trump plans to impose sanctions on several Iranian entities, seeking to ratchet up pressure on Tehran while crafting a broader strategy to counter what he sees as its destabilizing behavior, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
